document_data.name: ''Dowsing Eye of House Clatharla''
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite dragon annual/1997/The magic of Myth Drannor|94}}
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Dowsing Eye of House Clatharla''''' was one of the treasures in the [[Vault of Ages]].
document_data.Appearance: It was a crystal sphere.{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|132|6}}
document_data.Powers: Looking through the ''Eye'' revealed the course of waterflows across a realm, with sufficient resolution to see every handspan and every snag down to the last beaver dam.
document_data.History: The ''Dowsing Eye of House Clatharla'' was in the Vault of Ages as of {{yearlink|241}}.
